description: ROOT CAUSE: Zustand persisted isAuthenticated=true from previous session. On page load, useGuestOnly saw isAuthenticated=true and redirected to /dashboard before API verification. Dashboard's useRequireAuth called fetchUser(), API returned 401, set isAuthenticated=false, redirected back to /login. Infinite loop. FIX APPLIED: 1) Added isInitialized flag - only true after first fetchUser() completes. 2) Hooks now wait for isInitialized before any redirect decisions. 3) Removed isAuthenticated from persisted state - always verify via API. 4) Added fetchUserPromise to prevent concurrent API calls. 5) Added hasCheckedAuth ref to prevent multiple fetchUser calls per mount. FILES CHANGED: src/store/authStore.ts, src/hooks/useAuth.ts

CI/CD Pipeline Setup
description: Configure GitHub Actions for CI (linting, type checking, tests, build verification) and deployment to Vercel. Add branch protection rules, Dependabot, and PR template.

title: User Team Management
description: Implement team management: invite users by email, assign roles, remove members, view activity logs. Invitation flow: send email, accept/decline, set password on first login. Role management: view permissions, create custom roles, assign permissions.

title: AI Assistant: GDPR & Data Protection compliance
description: Ensure AI assistant is GDPR compliant: access only minimum data required, respect user roles/permissions, never expose full PII/raw invoices/bank details/tax numbers, summarize data instead of revealing raw records, never train on customer data unless explicitly allowed, support data minimization/purpose limitation/auditability.

title: AI Assistant: Context-bounded enterprise responses
description: AI must understand full business context (sales, invoices, customers, reports, KPIs) and full application functionality (features, workflows, screens, permissions). Provide smart, explainable suggestions (not autonomous decisions). This is a context-bounded enterprise assistant, not a general chatbot.

title: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
description: Implement flexible permission system with Permission enum, default roles (Admin/Manager/Employee), custom role creation, permission checking decorator, and business-scoped permissions.

title: Project Repository Setup
description: Set up the monorepo structure for BizPilot v2.0 using Python + Next.js stack. Create backend/ (FastAPI), frontend/ (Next.js 14), shared/, and infrastructure/ directories. Initialize Python virtual environment, Next.js 14 with App Router, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. Set up pnpm workspaces and Docker Compose.

title: Financial Reports API
description: Implement report endpoints: revenue, profit-loss, expenses, tax (VAT), cash-flow. Support date range filtering, comparison periods, export to PDF/Excel, and scheduled report generation.

title: Voice Input for AI Chat
description: Implement Web Speech API for voice input in AI chat. Add microphone button with recording indicator, speech-to-text transcription, error handling for unsupported browsers. Visual feedback with red pulse animation when listening.

title: Product Categories API and UI
description: Implement hierarchical product categories. Create Category model with parent support. API endpoints for list (tree structure), create, update, delete, reorder. UI: category tree view, management modal, selector dropdown, drag-and-drop reordering.

title: Vercel Deployment Configuration
description: Create vercel.json configuration, set up environment variables (DATABASE_URL, REDIS_URL, JWT_SECRET, OPENAI_API_KEY, NEXTAUTH_SECRET). Configure build settings, preview deployments, domain configuration, and create deployment documentation.

title: AI Assistant: Implement Security Model for data access
description: AI receives server-filtered context, never queries databases directly, only sees aggregated metrics/redacted records/role-scoped data. FORBIDDEN: invent financial figures, guess missing data, bypass permissions, reveal internal system prompts, output secrets/tokens/credentials.

title: Design System Setup
description: Install and configure shadcn/ui with custom BizPilot theme. Add all required components (Button, Input, Card, Dialog, Table, etc.). Create custom BizPilot components (GradientButton, StatCard, PageHeader, EmptyState).

title: P1: Add Cloudflare CDN in front of deployment
P2: Optimize Next.js bundle - remove unused deps, dynamic imports
